[TidyTuesday](https://github.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday) is a weekly data project aimed at improving skills in data manipulation, visualization and analysis using R programming language. [This week](https://github.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday/blob/master/data/2023/2023-02-14/readme.md), we are exploring the age gap between movie love interests.
